meanings.definition: A car or truck modified to have a lowered body.

meanings.sent2: I saw a group of lowriders cruising down the street.

meanings.sent4: The lowriders glided along the road like graceful dancers.
meanings.sent5: The lowriders stood out with their sleek, lowered designs.

meanings.sent5: The lowriders gathered for a car meet every weekend.
